of_basis_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem locally_convex_space.of_basis_zero {ι : Type _} (b : ι → Set E) (p : ι → Prop)
    (hbasis : ((nhds) 0).has_basis p b) (hconvex : ∀ i, p i → Convex 𝕜 (b i)) : locally_convex_space 𝕜 E :=
  by
  refine'
    locally_convex_space.of_bases 𝕜 E (fun (x : E) (i : ι) => «expr '' » ((· + ·) x) (b i)) (fun _ => p) (fun x => _)
      fun x i hi => (hconvex i hi).translate x
  rw [← map_add_left_nhds_zero]
  exact hbasis.map _
#align locally_convex_space.of_basis_zero locally_convex_space.of_basis_zero
of_bases:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem locally_convex_space.of_bases {ι : Type _} (b : E → ι → Set E) (p : E → ι → Prop)
    (hbasis : ∀ x : E, ((nhds) x).has_basis (p x) (b x)) (hconvex : ∀ x i, p x i → Convex 𝕜 (b x i)) :
    locally_convex_space 𝕜 E :=
  ⟨fun x =>
    (hbasis x).to_has_basis (fun i hi => ⟨b x i, ⟨⟨(hbasis x).mem_of_mem hi, hconvex x i hi⟩, le_refl (b x i)⟩⟩)
      fun s hs => ⟨(hbasis x).index s hs.1, ⟨(hbasis x).property_index hs.1, (hbasis x).set_index_subset hs.1⟩⟩⟩
#align locally_convex_space.of_bases locally_convex_space.of_bases
locally_convex_space_infi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
theorem locally_convex_space_infi {ts' : ι → TopologicalSpace E} (h' : ∀ i, @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ (ts' i)) :
    @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _
      («expr⨅ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , »" (ts' i)) :=
  by
  refine' locally_convex_space_Inf _
  rwa [forall_range_iff]
#align locally_convex_space_infi locally_convex_space_infi
locally_convex_space_inf:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
theorem locally_convex_space_inf {t₁ t₂ : TopologicalSpace E} (h₁ : @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ t₁)
    (h₂ : @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ t₂) : @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ («expr ⊓ » t₁ t₂) :=
  by
  rw [inf_eq_infᵢ]
  refine' locally_convex_space_infi fun b => _
  cases b <;> assumption
#align locally_convex_space_inf locally_convex_space_inf
locally_convex_space_induced:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
theorem locally_convex_space_induced {t : TopologicalSpace F} [locally_convex_space 𝕜 F] (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E 𝕜 F) :
    @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ (t.induced f) :=
  by
  letI : TopologicalSpace E := t.induced f
  refine'
    locally_convex_space.of_bases 𝕜 E (fun x => preimage f) (fun x => fun s : Set F => s ∈ (nhds) (f x) ∧ Convex 𝕜 s)
      (fun x => _) fun x s ⟨_, hs⟩ => hs.linear_preimage f
  rw [nhds_induced]
  exact (locally_convex_space.convex_basis <| f x).comap f
#align locally_convex_space_induced locally_convex_space_induced
locally_convex_space_iff_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem locally_convex_space_iff_zero :
    locally_convex_space 𝕜 E ↔
      ((nhds) 0 : Filter E).has_basis (fun s : Set E => s ∈ ((nhds) 0 : Filter E) ∧ Convex 𝕜 s) id :=
  ⟨fun h => @locally_convex_space.convex_basis _ _ _ _ _ _ h 0, fun h =>
    locally_convex_space.of_basis_zero 𝕜 E _ _ h fun s => And.right⟩
#align locally_convex_space_iff_zero locally_convex_space_iff_zero
locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_s:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_subset_zero :
    locally_convex_space 𝕜 E ↔ ∀ U ∈ ((nhds) 0 : Filter E), ∃ S ∈ ((nhds) 0 : Filter E), Convex 𝕜 S ∧ S ⊆ U :=
  (locally_convex_space_iff_zero 𝕜 E).trans hasBasis_self
#align locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_subset_zero locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_subset_zero

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_subset :
    locally_convex_space 𝕜 E ↔ ∀ x : E, ∀ U ∈ (nhds) x, ∃ S ∈ (nhds) x, Convex 𝕜 S ∧ S ⊆ U :=
  (locally_convex_space_iff 𝕜 E).trans (forall_congr' fun x => hasBasis_self)
#align locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_subset locally_convex_space_iff_exists_convex_subset
locally_convex_space_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Anatole Dedecker. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Anatole Dedecker
-/
theorem locally_convex_space_iff :
    locally_convex_space 𝕜 E ↔ ∀ x : E, ((nhds) x).has_basis (fun s : Set E => s ∈ (nhds) x ∧ Convex 𝕜 s) id :=
  ⟨@locally_convex_space.convex_basis _ _ _ _ _ _, locally_convex_space.mk⟩
#align locally_convex_space_iff locally_convex_space_iff
locally_convex_space_Inf:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
theorem locally_convex_space_Inf {ts : Set (TopologicalSpace E)} (h : ∀ t ∈ ts, @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ t) :
    @locally_convex_space 𝕜 E _ _ _ (infₛ ts) :=
  by
  letI : TopologicalSpace E := Inf ts
  refine'
    locally_convex_space.of_bases 𝕜 E
      (fun x => fun If : Set ts × (ts → Set E) =>
        «expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »" (If.2 i))
      (fun x => fun If : Set ts × (ts → Set E) => If.1.finite ∧ ∀ i ∈ If.1, If.2 i ∈ @nhds _ (↑i) x ∧ Convex 𝕜 (If.2 i))
      (fun x => _) fun x If hif => convex_interᵢ fun i => convex_interᵢ fun hi => (hif.2 i hi).2
  rw [nhds_infₛ, ← infᵢ_subtype'']
  exact has_basis_infi' fun i : ts => (@locally_convex_space_iff 𝕜 E _ _ _ ↑i).mp (h (↑i) i.2) x
#align locally_convex_space_Inf locally_convex_space_Inf
exists_open_convexes:
/-- In a locally convex space, if `s`, `t` are disjoint convex sets, `s` is compact and `t` is
closed, then we can find open disjoint convex sets containing them. -/
theorem disjoint.exists_open_convexes [locally_convex_space 𝕜 E] {s t : Set E} (disj : Disjoint s t) (hs₁ : Convex 𝕜 s)
    (hs₂ : IsCompact s) (ht₁ : Convex 𝕜 t) (ht₂ : IsClosed t) :
    ∃ u v, IsOpen u ∧ IsOpen v ∧ Convex 𝕜 u ∧ Convex 𝕜 v ∧ s ⊆ u ∧ t ⊆ v ∧ Disjoint u v :=
  by
  letI : UniformSpace E := TopologicalAddGroup.toUniformSpace E
  haveI : UniformAddGroup E := comm_topologicalAddGroup_is_uniform
  have := (locally_convex_space.convex_open_basis_zero 𝕜 E).comap fun x : E × E => x.2 - x.1
  rw [← uniformity_eq_comap_nhds_zero] at this
  rcases disj.exists_uniform_thickening_of_basis this hs₂ ht₂ with ⟨V, ⟨hV0, hVopen, hVconvex⟩, hV⟩
  refine'
    ⟨s + V, t + V, hVopen.add_left, hVopen.add_left, hs₁.add hVconvex, ht₁.add hVconvex, subset_add_left _ hV0,
      subset_add_left _ hV0, _⟩
  simp_rw [← Union_add_left_image, image_add_left]
  simp_rw [UniformSpace.ball, ← preimage_comp, sub_eq_neg_add] at hV
  exact hV
#align disjoint.exists_open_convexes disjoint.exists_open_convexes
convex_open_basis_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
-- see Note [lower instance priority]
theorem locally_convex_space.convex_open_basis_zero [locally_convex_space 𝕜 E] :
    ((nhds) 0 : Filter E).has_basis (fun s => (0 : E) ∈ s ∧ IsOpen s ∧ Convex 𝕜 s) id :=
  (locally_convex_space.convex_basis_zero 𝕜 E).to_has_basis
    (fun s hs => ⟨interior s, ⟨mem_interior_iff_mem_nhds.mpr hs.1, isOpen_interior, hs.2.interior⟩, interior_subset⟩)
    fun s hs => ⟨s, ⟨hs.2.1.mem_nhds hs.1, hs.2.2⟩, subset_rfl⟩
#align locally_convex_space.convex_open_basis_zero locally_convex_space.convex_open_basis_zero
convex_basis_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem locally_convex_space.convex_basis_zero [locally_convex_space 𝕜 E] :
    ((nhds) 0 : Filter E).has_basis (fun s => s ∈ ((nhds) 0 : Filter E) ∧ Convex 𝕜 s) id :=
  locally_convex_space.convex_basis 0
#align locally_convex_space.convex_basis_zero locally_convex_space.convex_basis_zero
